special_text:
As Grist, the First Success enters, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
The number of loyalty counters on Grist, the First Success is equal to the number of Insects you control. [i](Create or sacrifice 1/1 green Insects whenever Grist gains or loses loyalty.)[/i]
[+1]: You may exile a card from your graveyard. If you do, you gain life equal to its mana value.
[-2]: Destroy target nonland permanent.
notes:
Inspiration — Failed experiment, living insect swarm, Grist backstory

Mechanical Uniqueness — Planeswalker with changing loyalty value
